Text: Why is this .rar? Is this .mkv after extraction? last three epiosdes have been .rar why? What is the advantage?

Scene comes as rars. Guy probably just mirrors releases. Advantage is only that you know ure getting the release intact and 100% working.

Good example is; there's movie named "easy a" floating in p2p network atm that's 1080p version is semibroken with a glitch at start. That might happen when someone has faulty HD. If it were in rars that wouldnt happen.
Yea but to be honest, its a real hassle to get it all unrared...
